definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
powerful individual, family or group/clique/(loanword) valve

sentences.english: The safety valve shall feature a raised seat and non-mechanical disc alignment.
sentences.chinese: 安全閥必須配置凸出的閥座和非機械式閥瓣排列。

sentences.english: Damage or fouled relief valve seat.
sentences.chinese: 安全閥閥座損壞或受到污染。

sentences.english: Full set of clips, hose, safety valve, suction cups etc.
sentences.chinese: 回形管，軟管，安全閥，吸盤等。

sentences.english: Hydrostatic test plugs will be provided for all the spring loaded safety valves.
sentences.chinese: 每隻彈簧安全閥都帶有水壓試驗堵塞及試驗壓緊工具。

sentences.english: The working pressure of safety valve should be set as per the applicable Standards.
sentences.chinese: 安全閥的工作壓力須按規定整定。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a safety valve for hydraulic jack, which belongs to the technical field of hydraulic tools.
sentences.chinese: 一種液壓千斤頂的安全閥，屬於液壓工具技術領域。

sentences.english: Check the temperature-pressure relief valve to insure that the valve has not become incrusted with lime.
sentences.chinese: 檢查降溫減壓安全閥是否被石灰堵塞。

sentences.english: Safety valve can be covered with the body or pump Zhucheng one, can also be a separate assembly.
sentences.chinese: 安全閥可以與泵體或泵蓋鑄成一體，也可以單獨裝配。

sentences.english: With so many companies, in previous years very few such safety valve.
sentences.chinese: 在這麼多企業中，前幾年生產安全閥的廖廖無幾。

sentences.english: An emergency relief valve is arranged on the air reservoir or the wind pipe connected with the air reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 儲氣罐或連接儲氣罐的風管還配裝有安全閥。

sentences.english: An O-ring seals the relief valve body to the main housing.
sentences.chinese: 用一個O形環密封安全閥閥體與主外殼。

sentences.english: No safety valve in D. H. W.
sentences.chinese: 生活水水路無需安全閥，預防漏水。

sentences.english: The safety precaution must be re-inspected.
The relief valve should be able to be removed by unscrewing the relief valve from the housing.
sentences.chinese: 通過從外殼上旋下安全閥應該能夠拆卸安全閥。

sentences.english: The relief valve should be able to be removed by unscrewing the relief valve from the housing.
sentences.chinese: 通過從外殼上旋下安全閥應該能夠拆卸安全閥。

sentences.english: Remove the pressed in relief valve seat and seat O-ring.
sentences.chinese: 拆卸壓進去的安全閥閥座和閥座O形環。
